name: Offroad Zombies Killer Car
description:
Zombie Killer Car is Unique 3D game with features that are not available in any of game available on play store.
Police car is equipped with long range sniper gun,to kill the zombies walking here and there in the city, your car is equipped with best sniper so move fast and use drift style to avoid all hurdles and kill all zombies as fast as you can
Don't be scared and kill those dead walking people,as you are real zombies shooter/killer.
Be Careful some fast runner zombies equipped them self with bomb so keep yourself away from those terrorist zombies. so race your police jeep and shot down zombies.
Kill army soldiers zombies,and take your revenge.


Features
Best 3D drift style game.
long range Sniper gun to kill Zombies.
Easy Controls
No internet connection required.
All features fully unlocked for bring smile on your face.
